cast.title: The Little Minister
cast.overview: In rural 1840's Scotland, Gavin Dishart arrives to become the new "little minister" of Thrums's Auld Licht church. He meets a mysterious young gypsy girl in the dens and to his horror Babbie draws him into her escape from the soldiers after she incites a Luddite riot. But unknown to Gavin, Babbie is more than she seems. And they must overcome her secret, the villagers' fears of her, and worst of all, Gavin's devotion to his mother's sensibilities, before they can openly declare their love.

cast.title: Abe Lincoln in Illinois
cast.overview: Abe Lincoln in Illinois is a 1940 biographical film which tells the story of the life of Abraham Lincoln from his departure from Kentucky until his election as President of the United States.

cast.title: Annie Oakley
cast.overview: Awkward Annie (Barbara Stanwyck) loves her sharpshooting rival (Preston Foster) in Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show.

cast.title: Water Wagons
cast.overview: A boat race rivalry erupts into comical danger.

cast.title: It's a Wonderful World
cast.overview: Detective Guy Johnson's client, Willie Heywood, is framed for murder. While Guy hides him so he can catch the real killer, both of them are nabbed by the police, tried, convicted and sentenced to jail: Guy for a year with Willie to be executed. On the way to jail, Guy comes across a clue and escapes from the police.

cast.title: Border Patrol
cast.overview: When three Texas Rangers try to investigate kidnapped Mexicans being used as forced labor in the mines of Silver Bullet, they are framed for murder by the town's corrupt sheriff.

cast.title: Doomed Caravan
cast.overview: Stephen Westcott and Ed Martin scheme to put Jane Travers' wagon line out of business. They want to use it take over all the wagon- train traffic going west. Hoppy, California and Lucky must make sure that doesn't happen.

cast.title: Fool's Gold
cast.overview: The son of an Army friend is about the join an outlaw gang. Hoppy prevents this and brings the gang to justice.

cast.title: Forty Thieves
cast.overview: When he runs for sheriff, Hoppy is beaten by Jerry Doyle, the gutless wonder voted for by every crook in town. When Hoppy moves to have the new sheriff impeached, outlaw leader Tad Hammond hires forty gunslingers to stop him. Stop Hoppy? Hah!

cast.title: Pirates on Horseback
cast.overview: Hoppy, Lucky and California search for a mine owned by Trudy Pendleton after it was taken from her by thw swindling gambler Ace Gibson. They find the mine and Hoppy fights Gibson over it.

cast.title: Borrowed Trouble
cast.overview: Finishing a trail drive, Hoppy and the boys head to town and immediately get caught up in the conflict between school teacher Miss Abott and next door saloon owner Mawson. When Miss Abott disappears, Hoppy gets a clue to her location and rescues her from Mawson's cabin. It looks like Mawson is the man he wants, but Hoppy finds an item that indicates otherwise.

cast.title: Dangerous Venture
cast.overview: Sue Morgan gets Hoppy and his friends to join their expedition looking for Indian artifacts. Expedition leader Atwood makes a deal with nearby cattle rustler Morgan to loot the Indian treasures instead and sell them. Hoppy is on to their plan and pretending to leave follows them. Not only is he outnumbered by Morgan's men, but California has himself about to be sacrificed in an Indian ritual.

cast.title: False Colors
cast.overview: Before he was killed by Mark Foster's men, Bud Lawton willed part ownership in his ranch to Hoppy and his two pals. When the three arrive they find a fake posing as Lawton. When they expose the imposter, Foster gets the Sheriff to jail them for Lawton's murder.

cast.title: The Devil's Playground
cast.overview: Hoppy finds a wounded girl and later finds Judge Morton who claims the girl is his daughter and he is looking for her. But Hoppy soon learns the girl is looking for stolen gold she wants to return and the Judge in not her father but only wants the gold. Hoppy and the girl find the gold but the Judge and his men find Hoppy and the boys and trap them in a cabin.

cast.title: In Old Colorado
cast.overview: Joe Weller has instigated a conflict over water rights between two ranchers. The idea is to have the ranchers do each other in then move in and take over. Hoppy and the good guys won't let this happen.

cast.title: Leather Burners
cast.overview: As rustled cattle have mysteriously disappeared, Johnny sends for his friend Hoppy, Hoppy arrives and immediately suspects Dan Slack. Realizing his telegram about Slack was intercepted, he locks up the operator Lafe knowing he can escape. Tailing Lafe he finds a secret entrance to a mine and inside finds the missing cattle. But Slack's men also find him just as the cattle are stampeded through the mine shaft.

cast.title: Sinister Journey
cast.overview: Lee Garvin has eloped with the daughter of a railroad man who didn't approve of the marriage. Hoppy steps in when the young man is framed for murder.

cast.title: Riders of the Timberline
cast.overview: Hopalong Cassidy and Johnny Nelson ride to the mountains to help a man and his daughter save their logging business from someone who is sabotaging their efforts.

cast.title: Riders of the Deadline
cast.overview: When Hoppy's falsely accused young friend is killed while supposedly trying to escape from jail, an embittered Hoppy is blamed and drummed out of the Texas Rangers.

cast.title: False Paradise
cast.overview: A banker is trying to cheat people out of their silver-rich land. Hoppy learns that the banker is in league with an outlaw gang.

cast.title: Unexpected Guest
cast.overview: At the reading of his late cousin's will, California learns the estate will be divied among whoever remains of the seven relatives. With one already dead, another immediately murdered, and the Lawyer telling them the ranch is almost worthless, Hoppy investigates.

cast.title: Wide Open Town
cast.overview: Belle Langtry runs a town being taken over by cattle rustlers. She is also a front for the outlaws, who are led by Steve Fraser. Hoppy gets elected sheriff and cleans up the town with help from the Bar 20 boys.

cast.title: Undercover Man
cast.overview: A bandit who robs both Americans and Mexicans is causing each side of the border to blame the other. Hoppy has to settle matters.

cast.title: Three Men From Texas
cast.overview: Hoppy and new sidekick California Carlson head to California to help out Lucky Jenkins.

cast.title: Stick To Your Guns
cast.overview: The Bar 20 boys are after Nevada and his gang of cattle rustlers. Hoppy and California join Nevada's gang under assumed names. Johnny and the rest of Bar 20 get directions from Winters and head out looking for Hoppy's signal. But Winters wanders on ahead and gets spotted. This lets Nevada trap them in a canyon and to make matters worse, Hoppy's masquerade has been exposed.

cast.title: The Dead Don't Dream
cast.overview: Three bodies turn up in a frontier hotel. Hoppy solves the murders and chases the killers through unusually misty and dark locations.

cast.title: Colt Comrades
cast.overview: While oil drilling, Hoppy and California discover an underground well - a potential threat to Jebb Hardin's monopoly on water in the region.

cast.title: Silent Conflict
cast.overview: One of Hoppy's Bar 20 ranch hands is tricked into participating in nefarious activities after being subjected to hypnosis.

cast.title: Hoppy Serves A Writ
cast.overview: Posing as a cattle buyer, Hoppy crosses over into Oklahoma where the Jordan brother's and their outlaw gang operate outside the law. After receiving an unfriendly reception when he finds them, he, California, and Johnny rustle their cattle and drive across the river into Texas. He hopes they will cross over to retrieve their cattle and then he can arrest them.

cast.title: Secrets of the Wastelands
cast.overview: Hoppy is leading a scientific expedition and the Chinese who have a hidden settlement nearby are trying to stop them. Saulters and his outlaw gang are also in the area looking for a gold mine. When Saulters men attack, the gold mine is found. Hoppy agrees to file for the Chinese and heads after Saulters in the chase to the land office.

cast.title: Mystery Man
cast.overview: Hoppy's ranch is threatened by rustlers. Hoppy and the gang oblige as usual.

cast.title: Hoppy's Holiday
cast.overview: Hoppy, California, and Lucky travel to Mesa City for a short vacation. California buys new clothes and carrying his old ones in a suitcase, bumps into escaping bank robbers in the dark. His suitcase gets switched with that of the robbers and he is seen with the money. Hoppy must find the money that has mysteriously disappeared and also the robbers so that he can clear California who is now in jail.

cast.title: Texas Masquerade
cast.overview: A gang of outlaws are using force to become possessors of every ranch in the area. Hoppie, of course, is out to stop them.

cast.title: The Marauders
cast.overview: A bad guy has used several murders to drive all the inhabitants out of town in order to give his gang access to the oil which lies under the land.

cast.title: Border Vigilantes
cast.overview: A town bedeviled with outlaws sends for Hoppy, Lucky and California after their own vigilante committee fails to solve the towns problems. Hoppy discovers that the bad guys are led by the town boss, and so are the vigilantes.

cast.title: Strange Gamble
cast.overview: Hoppy is an agent of the federal government investigating the counterfeiting of both U.S. and Mexican money. His only clues are the name "Mordigan" and a drawing of a comet.

cast.title: Twilight on the Trail
cast.overview: Hoppy, Lucky and California are chasing cattle rustlers who have been bothering cattle rancher friends of Hoppy. A crooked foreman is the source of the trouble. Johnny and Lucy are the love focus.

cast.title: Outlaws of the Desert
cast.overview: Hoppy, Johnny and California go to Arabia to buy some horses. There they get involved with a sheik and a harem and a kidnapping plot.

cast.title: Lost Canyon
cast.overview: Burton is after Clark's ranch. He gets the banker to refuse to renew Clark's note and then sends his men to rustle his cattle. Hoppy is Clark's new foreman and is on to Burton's scheme. But just as he learns of the rustling and is about to go after the gang, the Sheriff arrives and arrests him for hiding Johnny who has been accused of robbery.

cast.title: Bar 20
cast.overview: Stagecoach robbers take the money Hoppy was going to use to buy cattle so Hoppy, California and Lin go after them.

cast.title: Lumberjack
cast.overview: Julie's husband has been murdered and land agents want her to sign away her property rights. Hoppy warns against this but she does so anyway. It looks as though she will be unable to deliver the timber called for in her agreement. Hoppy has to make the lumber deal happened and solve the murder.

cast.title: The Green Years
cast.overview: An orphaned Irish boy is taken in by his mother's Scottish relations.

cast.title: Dora's Dunking Doughnuts
cast.overview: Schoolteacher Andy Wilson makes his usual morning stop for coffee and donuts at Dora's Home Bakery. Today he enjoys talking to Dora so much that he is late to school for the first time. Later that day, Dora tells him about some wonderful new donuts that she has made. Andy is so impressed with them that he decides to have his students help him make a radio commercial, in order to help Dora sell her new product. Written by Snow Leopard

cast.title: Carolina Cannonball
cast.overview: Judy and her grandpa run a trolley between a train depot and a ghost town in Nevada, near the California border. Three spies intent of tracking down an atomic missile gone astray arrive. When the trolley breaks down, Judy and Grandpa unwittingly install the engine from the nearby crashed missile.

cast.title: Million Dollar Legs
cast.overview: A small country on the verge of bankruptcy is persuaded to enter the 1932 Los Angeles Olympics as a means of raising money. Either a masterpiece of absurdity or a triumph of satire, depending on your mood, but it's quite possibly the funniest movie ever made, and becomes even funnier with subsequent viewings.

cast.title: The Bees' Buzz
cast.overview: Andy and Harry get into trouble while trying to stop the marriage of Andy's daughter.

cast.title: The Slappiest Days of Our Lives
cast.overview: Laurel is a Scottish reporter suspected of being a spy by police detective James Finlayson. Although trailed by the latter, Stan, who is reporting on the movie world, manages to be hired by Mack Sennett. He makes his debut in Nevada, in the middle of gold diggers. After managing to clear his name he becomes, with Oliver Hardy, a big comedy star.

cast.title: Song of the Prairie
cast.overview: Joan Wingate's wealthy father doesn't want his daughter to go into show business. As they vacation in the west she gets a job with Dan Tyler's show and uses Wingate money to keep him afloat. Sandwiched in between the numerous musical numbers they try to keep her father away from the show. But he eventually finds out and decides they will return east

cast.title: Super-Hooper-Dyne Lizzies
cast.overview: An eccentric inventor has thought of a way that automobiles can run on radio waves, without gasoline. His plans put him in conflict with the owner of an oil company, who is also pursuing the inventor's daughter. This rival begins to scheme against the inventor, and it is left up to the inventor's hired man to try to stop him.

cast.title: The Fainting Lover
cast.overview: This Andy Clyde short, in which Andy plays second fiddle to a bad performance by the usually reliable Wade Boteler, finds Boteler (as Bert) courting the daughter of Andy Clyde and Addie McPhail, and Andy reminds him that he shouldn't take her for granted, especially at a gathering where Dr. Dudley Smith, accomplished musician, artist, sportsman, lecturer, world traveler, singer, dancer and worker of cross-word puzzles, is putting heavy moves on Helen, Bert's intended. Bert allows as how he'll do something special for her on her birthday coming up next month. The something special ...

cast.title: Am I Having Fun!
cast.overview: Taxi driver Andy Clyde gets mixed up in drunken passenger Arthur Housman's scheme and has to dress up as a Indian to entertain Housman's guests. Then the real Indian comes and he gets confusion about what kind of Indian he's supposed to be.

cast.title: Lizzies of the Field
cast.overview: There is no love lost between the Red Dog Garage, and the Black Cat Garage, two auto repair shops on opposite sides of the street. A big cross-country auto race is announced, and it turns into a no-holds-barred contest as the rival garages go all out to win.

cast.title: Red Lights Ahead
cast.overview: A family loses its collective head going from rags to riches in this low-budget comedy from also-ran studio Chesterfield. Former slapstick comedian Andy Clyde starred as Grandpa Tom Hopkins who, after selling his junk business, moves in with daughter Molly (Lucille Gleason), her husband Ed (Roger Imhof), and their children Mary (Ann Doran), Edna (Paula Stone), George (Ben Alexander, and Willie (Frank Coghlan Jr.). Ed, who is a member of the town lodge "the Whales," is persuaded by Whitney (Sam Flint) the "Grand Harpoon," to buy $5,000 worth of shares in a promising gold mine, mortgaging the family home to do so. Soon the family is rich and everyone except Molly takes on airs.

cast.title: Whispering Whiskers
cast.overview: Billy Bevan and Andy Clyde are hobos who happen upon a train and are hired as cooks.

cast.title: Lodge Night
cast.overview: Andy gets into hot water because of his frequent lodge meetings.

cast.title: In the Dog House
cast.overview: Andy remarries, but his new wife has no use for either his son or his dog.

cast.title: Bad Lands
cast.overview: A sheriff and his posse set out to catch a murderer, but their mission proves more dangerous than anyone suspected after they become stranded in the desert and attacked by Apaches.

cast.title: The Plainsman and the Lady
cast.overview: Film about the early days of the Pony Express and the crooked businessman who opposed it.

cast.title: The Hollywood Kid
cast.overview: THE HOLLYWOOD KID (1924, Sennett, D: Roy Del Ruth) A short packed with more stars and gags than most features of its day, this film delivered a gaggle of guffaws! With appearances by Mack Sennett, Andy Clyde, Vernon Dent, Ben Turpin, Marie Prevost, Billy Bevan, Charlie Murray, a dozen bathing beauties and a toothless lion! The most fun in this comedy was seeing all of the behind the scenes shots of the studio as it really was and all as part of the frenetic plot.

cast.title: Galloping Bungalows
cast.overview: All the qualified men line up to be chosen, as an heiress advertises that she will marry the man with the most interesting mustache, that marriage which comes with a mansion. John Syrup Soother wins the marriage to who he believes is the heiress, Olive Palmer, a tank of a woman who has lost her beauty with age. But he learns that he his betrothed is not the heiress, Diana Palmer, but her mother. Howson Lotts, a shyster and one of Diana's other suitors, sells John a beach-front house for his new life, that house which is not all that it seems on the surface. In the meantime, others still will do anything to be Diana's betrothed, that choice in which John now has a different but still vested interest.

cast.title: Smith's Army Life
cast.overview: 19th release in 'The Smith Family' series of 2-reel comedies.

cast.title: Circus Today
cast.overview: Two circus hands create chaos.

cast.title: The Pride of Pikeville
cast.overview: Unlikely Lothario, the less-than-dashing crossed-eyed Ben Turoin, finds himself pursued by many beautiful ladies.

cast.title: It Always Happens
cast.overview: While on a business trip, Andy accidentially gets into a compromising position with the wife of a client.

cast.title: Andy Plays Hookey
cast.overview: Andy makes elaborate plans to attend a prizefight, and they all backfire.

cast.title: Yellow Dust
cast.overview: After he's accused of a series of stagecoach robberies, an innocent man has to find the real crooks.

cast.title: The Bluffer
cast.overview: A man tries to win the admiration of a girl's father, by pretending he's earned medals for bravery.

cast.title: Taxi for Two
cast.overview: Dan Doolittle is a poor schmuck whose big talk usually gets him into trouble. After he is fired from his plumbing job, he saves Dolly Davis, who, grateful, promises to get him a job at the company where she works, Owl Taxi, which is owned by her father. That job is as the jack-of-all-trades in the garage, under the supervision of the garage foreman, whose job he expects to have within the week. But Dan becomes the bane of the foreman's existence, in part because Dan would rather spend his time with Dolly to who he is attracted. But after Dan is asked by the boss to drive Dolly to the taxi depot, Dan believes he can make his millions instead by buying a cab and starting his own taxi company. Interactions with Dolly's visiting brother - a hosiery salesman - who Dan mistakenly believes is Dolly's boyfriend, a pair of inflatable legs, and an angry foreman who was fired because of Dan's mistakes in the garage lead to one misadventure after another for Dan.

cast.title: A Sea Dog's Tale
cast.overview: An island princess falls in love with a young man whose picture she sees in the newspaper. Her father, the king, sends his agents to the U.S. to kidnap the man and bring him back to the islands to marry his daughter. Complications ensue.

cast.title: Ice Cold Cocos
cast.overview: Billy and Andy impersonate two ice-delivery men in a suburban town. Billy takes a fancy to a newly-wed bride and most of his loose cash is liquidated as he flirts with her. Her husband is not pleased at Billy's attentions to his new bride. There is a skating contest at the local ice-rink, and the bride, her mother and her husband are in attendance, as are Billy and Andy, the icemen.

cast.title: Black Oxfords
cast.overview: In this Mack Sennett comedy, a mother and daughter fear foreclosure because their mortgage payment is due and they're unable to pay it. Meanwhile, the family's son Jack, who's in prison, unexpectedly finds himself free of captivity.

cast.title: The Dare-Devil
cast.overview: The movie makers are filming the next installment of the western serial, "Get Your Man". The movie's leading man wants his stunt double to do the next dangerous stunt. Purely by accident, a hapless, cross-eyed aspiring actor named Joe Magee ends up doing the stunt perfectly. He ends up doing dangerous stunt after stunt, all by accident, that fit the movie so perfectly that the movie's leading lady wants him in the picture. The exasperated director finds that getting Joe to do the stunts on command is an entirely different story.

cast.title: Broke in China
cast.overview: Donald Drake, a deep sea gondolier ex soda jerk, arrives at the All Nation Cafe in Shanghai. The proprietor believes he's a penniless ne'er-do-well - which he is - but he unexpectedly comes into a small windfall. So the proprietor orders slightly rough around the edges Maud and Mollie, two of his American good time girls working their way around the world, to get him to spend all his money while there. As Donald ends up telling the two good time girls his life story - most specifically about the blonde he let slip through his fingers, she who was the love of his life - a few revelations and the errant coin he left at the roulette wheel betting table change his life.

cast.title: Run, Girl, Run
cast.overview: A women's track team is preparing for a big meet against a rival college, but the coach is having trouble getting her team ready. Norma, the team's star, is more interested in slipping out to meet her boyfriend than she is with getting ready for the meet, so Norma and the coach engage in a clash of wills.

cast.character: King Lavorus of Bullomania / Professor Marsupp
cast.title: Bull and Sand
cast.overview: Adonis, the King of Bullomania's personal chauffeur, is in love with Princess Ernestine, the King's daughter. To win her heart, he accepts to fight bulls at the bullfighting school. But the princess is also courted by Manuel Risotto, a famous toreador who kidnaps her. The King chases after him in a car driven by Adonis. Unfortunately, the chauffeur lets Risotto run away. In a rage, the King condemns Adonis to the death penalty. But it is without counting a scientist who has invented a rocket, his assistant who falls down in the yard of Adonis's prison, a great escape featuring Adonis and the assistant disguised as bulls, a second abduction of the Princess - but, this time for the just cause of love -, a wild chase and a final flight to another planet!

cast.title: Two in a Crowd
cast.overview: When two halves of a thousand-dollar bill are discovered in the snow, the penniless pair that individually grabs each half must come to terms. Actress Julia Wayne needs the whole $1,000, and so does sportsman Larry Stevens. Since compromise will serve neither of their needs, they are stalemated - until complications arise.

cast.title: Smith's Uncle
cast.overview: Here it's Andy Clyde in a long beard as Raymond McKee's rich uncle Dan. He quickly becomes entangled with Carmelita Geraghty, the vamp next door, and her conniving brother Bud Jamison.

cast.title: The Rodeo
cast.overview: The film begins with a family at home having a meal. The biggest laugh involved some candles being substituted for asparagus and the hilarity that resulted when the people and dog at them. Later, the decide to go to the rodeo but 1001 problems occur on the way there in the car.

cast.title: The Golfers
cast.overview: Charlie Guest (Charlie Guest) wants to be a golfer. Bert Swor (Bert Swor) is a famous golfer. Thelma Hill (Thelma Hill) only loves the best golfer. Follow Charlie as he tries to become the world's greatest golfer and win Thelma's love.

cast.character: Judge B. Brief - Betty's Father / Insane Convict
cast.title: The Hansom Cabman
cast.overview: Harry Doolittle wakes up on the day he's to marry Betty Bright. He has a terrible hangover. A strange woman appears in his room saying that he married her the night before, and just then, his fiancée and her mother arrive. There's anger all around, leading to Harry's arrest. He's jailed while awaiting trial in front of Betty's father, a judge. She visits him in the clink. He escapes and disguises himself as a cabman. The police are looking for him, as are his fiancée and her mother. Will it get straightened out in time for wedding bells to ring?

cast.title: Clunked on the Corner
cast.overview: Johnny Burke stumbles into a beautiful crook, played by Carmelita Geraghty, who used him to steal a pearl necklace.

cast.title: Ships of the Night
cast.overview: In search of her fugitive brother, who wounded a man who was later murdered, Johanna Hearne encounters pirates, a Chinaman with a harem and criminals as slaves, and love on a desert island for ship captain Dan Meloy.

cast.title: Picking Peaches
cast.overview: A series of sketches with a shoe clerk, his wife, and his extra-curricular activities. The shoe clerk steps out on his wife with one of his customers. Both his wife and the woman's husband catch them when they go to the beach and later watch a beauty and fashion contest. His wife enters it wearing a mask. Back at work on Monday, all has returned to normal, until the winner of the contest shows up for her prize - a complete wardrobe...

cast.title: Hot Paprika
cast.overview: A former bank clerk who believes he has three months to live goes to the island of Paprika and gets involved in a revolution.

cast.title: That Texas Jamboree
cast.overview: With the backing of the Mayor, Brady is running a crooked gambling operation. When Sheriff Curt shuts him down, he reopens when the Mayor charters his place as a private club. When Curt decides to run for Mayor, he is made to shut down the popular Warren medicine show. With Curt now out of favor the Warrens decide to run their daughter for Mayor and Brady has a plan to stop her also.  - Written by Maurice VanAuken

cast.title: On Patrol
cast.overview: Billy Bevan trying to escape the cops!

cast.title: Wall Street Blues
cast.overview: A bumbling bank custodian becomes an unlikely hero when he foils a robbery.

cast.title: The Lion and the Souse
cast.overview: Mack Sennett silent short comedy.

cast.title: Matchmaking Mamma
cast.overview: This marriage is the second for both Mr. & Mrs. Cornelius McNitt. He is panty-whipped by his social climbing second wife. She has recruited Clifford Figfield to stage and direct a charity pageant, which is more a means for her to hobnob with the social elite, and to nab Larry Lodge, the pageant's leading man, as a husband for her flighty daughter Phyllis, the pageant's leading lady. Larry ends up only having eyes for Sally McNitt, Mr. McNitt's visiting daughter, and she, in turn has eyes for him.

cast.title: Shanghaied Lovers
cast.overview: Shanghaied on his wedding day, Harry struggles to cope with a cruel captain while fending off a sailor who seems attracted to him.

cast.title: Crashing Thru
cast.overview: When Ranger Raymond is killed during a stage holdup, Wells Fargo Agent Whip Wilson assumes his identity.

cast.title: Boobs in the Woods
cast.overview: Andy's annoying brother-in-law (Shemp Howard) gets him fired from his job, and then tag-a-longs on a vacation with Andy (Andy Clyde) and his wife (Esther Howard).

cast.title: Home on the Rage
cast.overview: Andy mistakenly believes his wife and brother-in-law are conspiring to murder him for insurance.

cast.title: Money Squawks
cast.overview: Andy and Shemp guard a mine's payroll at a train depot.

cast.title: Abilene Trail
cast.overview: Whip Wilson rides again in the Monogram western Abilene Trail. Wilson and his grizzled sidekick Andy Clyde are accused of horse stealing, a hangin' offense around these here parts. Eluding the authorities, the boys take jobs at a ranch where the real crook is hiding out.

cast.title: Cherokee Strip
cast.overview: Richard Dix stars as Dave Morrell, the new marshal of Goliath, Oklahoma. Immediately upon arrival, Morrell finds himself at odds with banker Coy Barrett (Victor Jory), who is actually the leader of all local criminal activities.

cast.title: Shadows of the West
cast.overview: U.S. Marshal Whip Wilson (Whip Wilson) decides to take a vacation and visit his old friend Winks Grayson (Andy Clyde), the ex-sheriff. Upon his arrival Whip learns of Winks' suspicions regarding newly-elected Sheriff Tanner (William Ruhl as William H. Ruhl), and the story of a frame-up of Paul Davis (Ted Adams) and his son Bud (Riley Hill), now being released from prison. Following a holdup and a killing, a band of outlaws hide at the Davis ranch, implicating them again. Paul is hot and Bud goes to jail. Whip and Winks work to clear Bud and expose the real leader of the outlaw gang.

cast.title: The Road to Denver
cast.overview: The Mayhew brothers flee from one Texas town to another as older brother Bill repeatedly attempts to keep younger brother Sam out of jail. Bill finally gives up on his younger brother and heads for Colorado. He gets a job and all is well until his brother shows up and takes a job that puts them on opposite sides of the law.

cast.title: Artist's Muddles
cast.overview: Andy "Sunshine" Wilson, a happy-go-lucky vagabond, catches a ride with motorist Luckenbach who is on a suicide mission, and nearly succeeds in his mission. Luckenbach is a great portrait artist suffering under the slight handicap of being unable to "do ears." The artist has painted a beautiful portrait of the wife of Pietro Cellini with the exception that her left ear is several times larger than it should be and not painted very well at that. Cellini also holds the keys to the city and Luckenbach getting the job of painting the city hall rides on Cellini's satisfaction with his wife's portrait. Andy accompanies the artist back to his studio, and this short being made in the pre-code days ensures the studio is filled with models wearing a little less than somewhat and less than that in a couple of cases.

cast.title: Arizona Territory
cast.overview: Prospector Jeff Malloy rescues Doris Devlin, owner of a trading post, from an ambush planned by her uncle, Kilburn, who is trying to scare her out of the territory so that he can continue his counterfeiting operations.

cast.title: Haunted Trails
cast.overview: Singing cowboy Whip Wilson, the foreman on a cattle drive, quits his job to pursue five bank robbers who murdered his brother.

cast.title: Romance in Manhattan
cast.overview: Ginger Rogers and Francis Lederer share equal billing -- and near-equal screen time -- in this amiable RKO programmer. Lederer plays Karel Novak, an incredibly naïve Czech immigrant who is taken under the wing of streetwise New York chorus girl Sylvia Dennis (Rogers). With the help of lovable cop-on-the-beat Murphy (J. Farrel McDonald), Sylvia hides Karel from the immigration authorities and ultimately falls in love with him. In addition to Karel's illegal-alien status, the plot is complicated by a crooked lawyer (Arthur Hohl) and a group of well-meaning welfare workers who endeavor to place Sylvia's kid brother Frank (Jimmy Butler) in a foster home.

cast.title: His New Mamma
cast.overview: The aging father of a farm lad thinks the boy is after dad's fiancée, so he banishes the lad. The young man heads to California where he drives a cab. Through a fare, he meets a lovely lassie. His work takes him to the beach, where he sees dad's fiancée with another man. The lad and his lassie follow the woman and try to prevent her from marrying yet another rich man. Will our farm boy and his sweetie stop injustice from happening again?

cast.title: Pardon My Wrench
cast.overview: Gil Lamb finds his chief competitor helping his girl friend's father with some household work. When George tells Andy he can not install the garbage disposal, the daughter, in order to help Gil make an impression on Andy, urges Gil to do the job. The impression made, due to Gil's efforts, is not the impression expected.

cast.title: There He Goes
cast.overview: 1925 Mack Sennett Comedies production three-reel short.

cast.title: Cherokee Uprising
cast.overview: The title insurrection in this low-budget Whip Wilson Western consists mainly of Iron Eyes Cody, who is conspiring to raid the wagon trains with crooked sheriff Marshall Reed and nefarious Indian agent Forrest Taylor.

cast.title: Fence Riders
cast.overview: Whip Wilson and Andy Clyde are back and Monogram's got 'em in Fence Riders. The Whipster comes to the aid of beautiful ranch owner Reno Browne, who is being victimized by rustlers Myron Healey and Riley Hill. To get Wilson out of the way, the villains frame him on a murder rap.

cast.title: Range Land
cast.overview: Monogram's Whip Wilson western series occasionally produced a better-than-average entry. In Range Land, Wilson and saddle pal Andy Clyde try to get the goods on a gang of stagecoach bandits.

cast.title: Gunslingers
cast.overview: Wilson and his saddle pal Andy Clyde come to the rescue of a group of ranchers who are being victimized by villain Ace Larabee (Douglas Kennedy). Ace has inside information that the railroad is coming through the territory, and he intends to grab up all the land and sell it to the train execs for a tidy profit.

cast.title: Outlaws of Texas
cast.overview: Monogram's Outlaws of Texas is surprisingly bereft of the action highlights one might expect from star Whip Wilson. This time, the Whip and his saddle pal Andy Clyde play heroes Tom and Hungry who work undercover to break up a gang of bank robbers.

cast.title: Silver Raiders
cast.overview: Arizona Ranger Larry Grant is posing as an outlaw while hunting for an outlaw gang, secretly led by Lance Corbin, that is stealing silver in Mexico and smelting it into bars for sale in the United States.

cast.title: The New Aunt
cast.overview: 28th release in 'The Smith Family' series of 2-reel comedies.

cast.title: The Ring and the Belle
cast.overview: Andy becomes the manager of a prizefighter. The problem is, the figher has just skipped town.

cast.title: Throw a Saddle on a Star
cast.original_title: Throw a Saddle on a Star
cast.overview: The "star" in the title of this low-budget singing Western was Dynamite, a wild stallion captured by cowboy Curt Walker (Ken Curtis) to ride in the Big Rodeo. Unscrupulous John Burton (Robert Stevens) has bet against Curt and does his best to sabotage the event. When lovely Barbara Allen (Adelle Roberts), Curt's new girlfriend, leaves town because of Burton's schemes, Curt loses the first couple of events. The big Bronco Busting contest is coming up, and Pop Walker (Andy Clyde) stalls the proceedings with a series of singing acts while the girl's brothers (the musical group the Hoosier Hot Shots) attempt to locate her. Barbara arrives just in time to spur Curt on to victory.

cast.title: Sundown Riders
cast.overview: This film was produced and released in 1944 by Film Enterprises for the 16mm school-and-institutional market, and was picked up and released in 1948 by Astor for theatrical 35mm showings. Both versions finds the citizens of Rockford upset over a series of murders and robberies. The Sundowners, Andy Clyde (Andy Clyde), Jay Kirby (Jay Kirby) and Russ Wade (Russell Wade), ride into Rockford and innocently takes jobs with Tug Wilson (Jack Ingram) and his tough crew of line riders, who are in cahoots with Yeager (Hal Price) in a big land swindle scheme.

cast.title: Riders of the Dusk
cast.overview: Riders of the Dusk is another of Monogram's formula Whip Wilson westerns. Since the studio couldn't build an entire film around Wilson's bullwhip prowess, a plot was called for. This time around, it's the one about a U.S. marshal who searches high and low for a mysterious masked desperado. The mystery angle is minimal, since seasoned movie fans will be able to determine the mystery person's identity within 15 minutes. As always, Andy Clyde is a tower of comic strength as Whip Wilson's grizzled old sidekick.

cast.title: Columbia Laff Hour
cast.overview: A Columbia Pictures feature, featuring 4 unedited shorts, released between 1947-1956, featuring Shemp Howard.

cast.title: Share the Wealth
cast.overview: A local shoe clerk runs for mayor under a "Share the Wealth" platform but finds himself in trouble when he's the recipient of $50,000.

cast.title: It's the Cats
cast.overview: Andy prepares to give a speech to an organization of cat lovers.

cast.title: I'm a Father!
cast.overview: Andy, an avowed child-hater, changes his tune when he mistakenly believes his wife is pregnant.

cast.title: Old Sawbones
cast.overview: Old Doc Clyde is a country physician trying to compete with a younger and more modern doctor, and is having a hard time keeping up. They are both candidates for the job of county physician at a regular salary. and the committee stages a contest to see which handles the most patients in a week. Clyde wins by one patient, that being the wife of his competitor, and he is there ahead of the husband to deliver quintuplets.

cast.title: Tramp Tramp Tramp
cast.overview: When Andy's wife opens their home to derelicts, Andy keeps devising ways to chase them out.

cast.title: Alimony Aches
cast.overview: Ex-wife remarries, doesn't tell husband so he'll still pay alimony.

cast.title: Caught in the Act
cast.overview: Andy is mistaken for "Jack the Kisser," a man who grabs women on the street and kisses them.

cast.title: The Peppery Salt
cast.overview: Andy, the owner of an Oceanside lunch counter, tangles with a gang of kidnappers.

cast.title: Mister Smarty
cast.overview: Mr. Bowser believes that hell be able to clean the house more better than his wife can.

cast.title: Love Comes to Mooneyville
cast.overview: Andy and the local fire chief fall for the same woman.

cast.title: Knee Action
cast.overview: Andy takes his newest invention, a knee-action washing machine, before a group of potential investors, but his idiot stepson proceeds to disrupt the demonstration.

cast.title: Stuck in the Sticks
cast.overview: Andy's rival has wanted posters printed claiming that Andy's sweetheart is a swindler.

cast.title: My Little Feller
cast.overview: Andy and his friend Doodles find a baby on their doorstep and decide to care for it, but they are later accused of kidnapping it.

cast.title: Gracie at the Bat
cast.overview: Andy manages an all-girl softball team.

cast.title: He Done His Duty
cast.overview: A female con artist tries to fleece Andy and his rival.

cast.title: The Old Raid Mule
cast.overview: Andy feuds with his hillbilly neighbor.

cast.title: Jump, Chump, Jump
cast.overview: Andy and the local schoolteacher expose some crooked politicians.

cast.title: Ankles Away
cast.overview: Andy is duped into thinking his bride-to-be has a wooden leg.

cast.title: The Soul of a Heel
cast.overview: Andy tries to win the approval of his prospective father in law.

cast.title: Not Guilty Enough
cast.overview: At his trial, Andy tries to explain why he was arrested for assaulting his brother-in-law

cast.title: Swing, You Swingers!
cast.overview: Andy the proprietor of a music store, hates swing music.

cast.title: Boom Goes the Groom
cast.overview: Just as he's about to be the wed, Andy learns that his gold mine is worth a fortune.

cast.title: Now It Can Be Sold
cast.overview: Andy and his junior G-man nephew tangle with bank robbers.

cast.title: Trouble Finds Andy Clyde
cast.overview: Andy's twin brother gets Andy in hot water.

cast.title: All-American Blondes
cast.overview: Andy becomes the basketball coach for an all-girls school.

cast.title: Pardon My Nightshirt
cast.overview: Professor Clyde is on the lookout for a nightshirt bandit prowling the college campus.

cast.title: Andy Clyde Gets Spring Chicken
cast.overview: A group of show girls ignore Andy's romantic overtures - until they discover he's a millionaire.

cast.title: Mr. Clyde Goes to Broadway
cast.overview: Andy invests in a local theatrical production; when the actors flee with the money, Andy and his wife are forced to take their places and put on a show.

cast.title: Fireman, Save My Choo-Choo
cast.overview: Andy races his train against a modern bus; the winner receives a government franchise.

cast.title: A Bundle of Bliss
cast.overview: Andy has the mistaken impression that his wife is pregnant.

cast.title: The Watchman Takes a Wife
cast.overview: Night watchman Andy is convinced his wife is unfaithful.

cast.title: Yankee Doodle Andy
cast.overview: Andy, who works in a defense plant, stumbles upon a gang of Nazi saboteurs.

cast.title: Host to a Ghost
cast.overview: The Clyde Wrecking Company is assigned to demolish a haunted house.

cast.title: Lovable Trouble
cast.overview: Andy invests the money his wife gave him to pay the bills into a sure-fire money-making scheme, a girl's softball team made up of out-of-work chorus girls. Mrs. Clyde is, to say the least, not amused.

cast.title: Sappy Birthday
cast.overview: Andy and his brother-in-law plan a fishing trip but never get beyond the driveway.

cast.title: How Spry I Am
cast.overview: After an orphanage burns down, hotel keeper Andy is forced to provide the children with shelter.

cast.title: All Work and No Pay
cast.overview: Andy is a shopkeeper who's obsessed with crime radio programs. He finds out that a priceless diamond has been stolen by two thieves and Andy tracks them down on an ocean liner, but an escaped gorilla complicates his plans.

cast.title: Sappy Pappy
cast.overview: Andy, the owner of a bicycle shop, gets involved with one of his customers.

cast.title: Wolf in Thief's Clothing
cast.overview: Andy and Emmett try to win the affections of the town widow by presenting her with new whitewall tires.

cast.character: Andy Clyde, owner of Women's Clothing Store
cast.title: A Maid Made Mad
cast.overview: Andy innocently becomes involved with a female customer; his wife jumps to the wrong conclusion and walks out on him.

cast.title: Farmer for a Day
cast.overview: Andy tries to do his bit for the war effort by planting a victory garden.

cast.title: He Was Only Feudin'
cast.overview: The brother of Andy's fiance, who doesn't want to see the marriage go through, arranges for a pretty girl to make a pass at Andy so he can tell his sister that Andy's cheating on her.

cast.title: His Tale is Told
cast.overview: Andy journeys to the big city to sell an invention-followed closely by his suspicious wife.

cast.title: You Were Never Uglier
cast.overview: Andy and Emmett two ex-sailors, discover that married life isnt all its cracked up to be.

cast.title: Gold is Where You Lose It
cast.original_title: Gold is Where You Lose It
cast.overview: Robbers steal some gold and pass it off in Andy's store, but he and his friend think there's been a gold strike. They go off to do some prospecting.

cast.title: Heather and Yon
cast.overview: Andy helps his newspaper reporter friend get the goods on a killer, but when the friend gets injured and can't continue the job, Andy confesses to the murder and tries to expose the killer. while in the jailhouse.

cast.title: Two Local Yokels
cast.overview: Andy and Charles fancy themselves as ladies men, that is until Andy's wife finds out and wants a divorce.

cast.title: A Miner Affair
cast.overview: Clyde and Rogers dig for buried treasure so they can pay for a crippled boys operation.

cast.title: Spook to Me
cast.overview: Andy, the leader of the "Bloodhounds" boys patrol, investigates a house that is supposedly haunted.

cast.title: The Blonde Stayed On
cast.overview: While delivering a fur coat to a beautiful blonde, Andy runs into her jealous husband.

cast.title: You Can't Fool a Fool
cast.overview: Mayoral candidate Andy is examined by a doctor who believes Andy's crazy.

cast.title: Two Jills and a Jack
cast.overview: Andy thinks that his former sweetheart is now married to an old friend.

cast.title: Wife to Spare
cast.overview: Andy tries to fix a dilemma between a gold digging blonde and his brother-in-law who's smitten with her. This causes problems for Andy's wife.

cast.title: Eight-Ball Andy
cast.overview: Andy's gadget-happy brother-in-law is driving him crazy.

cast.title: Go Chase Yourself
cast.overview: College professor Andy Clyde is on the lookout for a nightshirt bandit who is terrorising the campus.

cast.title: Sunk in the Sink
cast.overview: Andy tries to prove to his wife that he can do the household chores more efficiently than she can.

cast.title: Marinated Mariner
cast.overview: Andy, the proprietor of an Oceanside lunch counter, tangles with a gang of kidnappers.

cast.title: A Blunderful Time
cast.overview: Andy's twin brother causes confusion for him and his wife.

cast.title: Blonde Atom Bomb
cast.overview: Andy tries to save his nephew from the wiles of a sultry nightclub singer.

cast.title: Pleasure Treasure
cast.overview: Andy and Emmett go prospecting for gold.

cast.title: A Blissful Blunder
cast.overview: When Andy returns home and finds a baby, he mistakenly think he's become a father.

cast.title: Hooked and Rooked
cast.overview: Andy and Emmett are two ex-sailors who return home after sailing out in the ocean and decide to propose to their fiancee's, but married life soon takes it toll on the two saps.

cast.title: Love's A-Poppin'
cast.overview: An actress believes Andy is wealthy an starts pursuing him.

cast.title: Oh, Say Can You Sue
cast.overview: In an attorneys office, Andy explains why he thought his sweetheart married his best friend.

cast.title: Tooting Tooters
cast.overview: Andy despises swing music but his nephew loves it.

cast.title: Two April Fools
cast.overview: Andy and Charles are suckered into buying a bogus treasure map.

cast.title: Scratch Scratch Scratch
cast.overview: Andy's nephew is about to get engaged, but his rival uses trickery to try to get it called off.

cast.title: One Spooky Night
cast.overview: Fraidy-cat Andy is assigned to demolish a haunted house.

cast.title: Andy Goes Wild
cast.overview: Andy's life is made miserable by his brother-in-laws penchant for crazy inventions.

cast.title: The Half-Back of Notre Dame
cast.overview: Romance hits a football player when he falls for an aviatrix.

cast.title: The Giddy Age
cast.overview: A quirky short about Love and Liars.
